alert.note: Alert for Geauga; Mahoning; Medina; Portage; Stark; Summit; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 8:58PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Portage, Trumbull, Mahoning, southeastern Geauga, southern Medina, Stark, Summit and northern Wayne Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 858 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bristolville to Wadsworth to Polk. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Akron, Canton, Youngstown, Warren, Medina, Salem, Ravenna, Cuyahoga Falls, Boardman, Massillon, Kent, Barberton, Green, Alliance, Hudson, Wadsworth, Niles, Twinsburg, Tallmadge and North Canton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
